document_data.caption: A map showing the Tearglade in northeast Stirgewick.
document_data.name: Tearglade
document_data.mainbody: The '''Tearglade''' was a marshland located in the kingdom of [[Callidyrr]] on the island of [[Alaron]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: The Tearglade was located in the county of [[Stirgewick]] along the eastern shore on the [[Sea of Swords]] where the [[Swanmay River]] met the sea.
